website_summaries.verdict: Vizio's S4251w-B4 sports rear speakers for unparalleled home theater sonics from a sound bar, although it has some quirks.
pros: The Vizio S4251w-B4 sound bar includes two rear speakers, allowing it to deliver a real surround-sound experience from a sound bar system
Its smart design lets you to connect the rear speakers to the wireless subwoofer in the back of the room, which minimizes the wire clutter that often accompanies surround sound
The sound bar itself has a stylish look, with a great remote that includes a built-in display
Features are well-covered, too, with built-in Bluetooth and Dolby/DTS decoding
And it's a good value, considering it includes two additional speakers
cons: The sound bar may block your TV's remote sensor when used in tabletop position
Also, if you use your TV to switch inputs, you likely won't get the best possible surround experience, although most listeners won't notice
And there's no guided speaker calibration, so you'll need to rely on your own ears for setup

customer_reviews.title: installed with 60" tv in a 12'w X 21'L room (room in progress)
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Excellent quality, sound & power for the price! Connected it to my 60" LG plasma in a room sized 12'x21'. I built this basement room for the sole purpose of a theater room and insulated the ceiling and walls but this system rumbled right thru it all... shoot every room in the house! Not saying that the sound is as good as my Bose system in my living room but I would definitely not complain as it sounds really good & powerful especially for the cost. CONS: not sue if its the TV or the system but when jumping up or down a level of sound, it seams as if it is to big of a move.
customer_reviews.author: RPriz

customer_reviews.title: BLUETOOTH CONNECTION SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: The sound and bass of this soundbar is great, I love it for movies and music. A very big issue is the bluetooth connection. Every time I try to connect my laptop via bluetooth it will most certainly NOT work. It takes me up to 10 minutes of connecting, disconnecting etc. trying everything and fidgeting around until if finally mysteriously works depending on the soundbars mood if it wants to comply. Sometimes it does not work at all. How are you supposed to connect it??? Very frustrating and a big issue!
customer_reviews.author: Alba

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this system because recommended by Consumer Reports magazine but it stopped working within ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this system because recommended by Consumer Reports magazine but it stopped working within 6 months. Vizio Customer Service was very responsive by sending a shipping box to return for repair or replacement. Returned the first system and after receiving the replacement it now does not work. Stopped working in a few more months.
customer_reviews.author: RDM

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: After 3 years it died. The 30 minutes before it died the sound starting fading out intermittently, then the power completely went out and can’t get it to come back to life. Also, for the life of me could not get the sound to balance correctly. Background music and sound effects always overpowered dialogue. Spent hours online trying to figure out how to configure it to correct that, but discovered that sound bars will always have that limitation over dedicated independent speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great sound bar surround system. Full 5.1 from a sound bar with real rears that hook into the wireless subwoofer makes for a great sounding and very clean setup. I'm an audio engineer, so audio quality is a priority for me. Now these don't compare to my studio monitors, but those will cost you $1,000+ each, so I don't expect this set up to keep up. However, for the price, they sound stellar. Highly recommend this system for the budget surround sound system for your entertainment system. Just make sure your TV outputs an actual 5.1 signal from HDMI through, otherwise you'll need to get a receiver to do your audio processing for you.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan. Caveat Emptor
customer_reviews.text: I had this soundbar for 3 years and at all times connected to a surge protector. Used it about 1-2x per week and after 3 years, it does to never again return from the dead. I tried different outlets, new cable, tried to mix it myself, and nada. Beyond disappointed with Vizio customer service. I can’t buy a new bar to at least be able to use the subwoofer and side speakers. Have to buy the thing all over again. Have the throw EVERYTHING away. What an absolute waste. Weill never buy Vizio again.
customer_reviews.author: christine c.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it. I was stuck for YEARS with volume ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. I was stuck for YEARS with volume from built-in TV speakers. What a dummy!! WOW, was I missing the boat. No more having to rewind to figure out dialog particularly those British shows on PBS, where those cockney accents can really mess you up. Just great beautiful and powerful, clear sound at a great price. The only downer was the remote. It takes some getting used toggling to the exact menu you want to adjust (Volume, Bass, treble, etc.). There has to be a better way to achieve that than this remote offers. Hard to beat this price point and what you get though. A winner.
customer_reviews.author: ShopnTilliDrop

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy the BILLZBUZZ no bueno!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought was great I still have it and it works just like it should. The one I bought from (BILLZBUZZ) was terrible the woofer pops and crackles not even 1/2 way up. And I only have the settings 3 passed even. Also 1/2 of the front cover of the sound bar was falling off. The package it came in was crappy. No protection for the items. And when I called they said well what do you expect for what You payed for. Um my items in all together working condition of course. Ya they stopped replying.
customer_reviews.author: Axle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product, Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge huge music buff and gamer, so I had been eyeing a soundbar for a while. Then I finally got it a while back during Black Friday. Been using it since. For everything from music to gaming. The best thing is it can be turned up so loud the room shakes, but at night it can be turned down low enough it doesn't wake anyone up either. And through the whole spectrum it just has some really amazing music quality. Hell even if I don't want my room shaking, I'll still plug my music up to this just because of how great the quality of sound is
customer_reviews.author: Mohak

customer_reviews.title: Remote breaks. No other way to work speakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one as a gift and one for myself. This was a year and a half passed. Speakers sound good still, but the remote in one is useless. The LED screen went out (by the way, the remote is a pain anyway. Hard to see as is not backlit). There is NO other way to adjust these speakers or change the input of the remote goes out. So far I have tried to order a replacement remote once... and the replacement had the same issue. I would avoid these speakers .
customer_reviews.author: Cooper D. Finseth

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup.. Excellent Sound.. Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and great performance. We accidently ordered the refurbished / open box unit. Disappointed, but not worth the trouble to send it back. Setup: Extremely siimple. Placed the soundbar underneath the tv on the mantle, and ran a single optical cable to the tv. Placed the Sub across the room with the two wall mounted satellites on either side. Sound Quality: This system puts out really impressive sound. Better than our prior $800 Sony mini system. It will not disappoint you. Cons: I expected the satellites to be wireless. They are not, they are wired and connect to the sub. Only the sound bar is wireless. Overall: Excellent value. Exceptional Sound. Easy Setup. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: B review

customer_reviews.title: Breathtaking, Movie Theater Sound
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound that I never thought I'd hear in my living room. Absolutely sounds like you're in a movie theater. Awesome high tech features like auto on and off - you never have to do either, the system reads the signal from your TV... like gradual volume increases when changing stations, etc. Fantastic! Strongly recommend. Have had no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Lynch

customer_reviews.title: The bluetooth works great with our phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our new 60 inch Samsung TV in the basement . Did not want to run wires for the rear speakers . The sub is bluetooth to the main front speaker and the 2 rear speakers connect with wires to the sub . Just plugged in the sub behind the couch and mounted the 2 rear speakers on either side of the sub about 12 feet apart . Mounted the front channel under the TV . The bluetooth works great with our phone . Just find the vizio on your phones Bluetooth and it connects . Great sound , can adjust level of rear speakers , front speakers and sub all thru the remote .
customer_reviews.author: chameleon

customer_reviews.title: The clicker is way too cumbersome, with a display that is nearly impossible to read.
customer_reviews.text: The clicker that comes with this unit is needlessly complex, and its liquid crystal display is nearly impossible to read except in the absolute best lighting conditions, which aren't exactly conducive to watching a movie. But it did work -- for a week. Then all of a sudden it just stopped working. So back to amazon.com it went.
customer_reviews.author: Wordwrkr

customer_reviews.title: An excellent value, and I'm choosy.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent value. Impressive quality for the money. My hearing is diminishing with age, and with sound being a major part of my enjoyment, I want to grab as much of its quality as I can afford. Flat screen TV audio is just POOR by design. Even broadcast quality (aerial antenna) commercials (in proper format) sound great! I returned 2 lower quality products before receiving this astonishment. I am happy with my final audio purchase. The sound bar is connected to the source (TV), while the peripherals are controlled by a nice wireless woofer. The woofer also sleeps to conserve energy when the sound bar is turned off. Overall ... highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BSchauerte

customer_reviews.title: Great sound option
customer_reviews.text: I sold off my complicated AVR and surround sound system when we moved to a different house, but my TV's built-in speakers quickly became inadequate. I tried several sound bar options, all of which got returned. I think I'll keep this one! I've had it hooked up for a couple of weeks now and I'm very happy with the sound -- especially for the money spent. The only real disappointment with it is the display on the remote -- it's VERY hard to read most of the time unless you have a lot of light shining on it at just the right angle. I probably won't be using it much after I get my Harmony remote reprogrammed to run it.
customer_reviews.author: MacBrian

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE
customer_reviews.text: Been using this soundbar daily wall mounted in my master bedroom with the subwoofer under the bed and surrounds on the night stands. It's worked flawlessly and sounds terrific. Love that the sub and surrounds are wireless (sub is wireless and communicates to the soundbar while the surrounds plug-in to the sub with wires). Makes it very convenient. I really like how when something that is in Dolby audio the soundbar will light up with a Dolby logo. I plan to buy the longer version for my Vizio 70" in the living room since this one has worked so well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Great Price. Great Sound.
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this you can't beat it. Love that the subwoofer and rear speakers are wireless from the front soundbar (note; there are wires from the two rear speakers to the subwoofer. Subwoofer plugs into wall). Easy set up and sounds amazing. The only con I would give this is the volume adjustment. Because it's not a knob sound increases/decreases in increments so sometimes it's either too loud or too low, but it hasn't been that big of an issue. I've had this for over two years. My friends like this so much I've had two of them get the same system for their homes and they too love it. Great price. Great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Buell

customer_reviews.title: good sound quality, cumbersome design
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the audio quality and overall function of the product, but the remote control interface and connections leave much to be desired. You can't set up the surround system without a lot of cumbersome wires strung around the area. The remote controller is tiny and thus becomes lost easily. The controls are not particularly intuitive or well-designed so that you have to press several buttons repeatedly to switch the input device and get it to play, to properly adjust the audio settings, or change other settings. It can also take a while for the system to recognize your input device after it is turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Coastal Hobbit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, good power on the subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, good power on the subwoofer. For the price, i think is the best wifi soundbar is the closest thing to traditional home theater. Pros: •Easy installation and connectivity •Minimal wires •Modern design •Great for small-medium living spaces •Excellent virtual sound, which simulates the surround sound experience •May wifi remote control •Full range surround sound •5.1 Audio Experience •Able to place speakers in multiple stations for optimal acoustics •Maximum bass •Wirelessly stream your music from a smartphone or tablet via Bluetooth •Table-stand or wall-mount options •IR remote control that link to other IR remote controls Cons: •May need wifi remote control
customer_reviews.author: Luis Roberto Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: it's not bad. Def better then the TV speakers
customer_reviews.text: For what it is and the price for a small room, it's not bad. Def better then the TV speakers. Cons: the volume control is pretty much soft to loud and louder, and if you connect BT, it doesn't default back to the TV input after using the BT function. Update After using for a while, it's still pretty good. Although, the volume always likes to reset. And there is usually a couple seconds lag when first turning up the volume. Late at night, we overcompensate by hitting the button a bunch and the unit goes from no sound to apartment rattling sound!
customer_reviews.author: Cluecheck

customer_reviews.title: I watched GOLD RUSH on Discovery and sound was just amazing. I highly recommend this sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Few months ago I had a Denon AVR 1913 connected to Harman Kardon HKTS-11BQ - 5.1, I gave it to my brother and just bought this Vizio sound bar , Ave never been a fan of sound bar , but when I saw the reviews on Amazon and CNET plus the 2 awards it won I decided to give a trial. I was blown away with the sound of this Vizio.I watched GOLD RUSH on Discovery and sound was just amazing. I highly recommend this sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeZILLA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sound System to go with your X-Box One!!
customer_reviews.text: WoW!! This is probably one of the best Sound system on the market for such a "Steal" of a price to date!! We use it for our new X-Box One system due to the fact that our old out dated 5 year old system was not compatible with the XB1. If you want Movie theater sound, without braking the bank, this system is for you. we highly recommend getting the Atlantic Satellite 77305018 2 Speaker Stands (Black) for your surround sound speakers. Use the Soundbar screws for the surround sound speaker mounting on the Atlantic Satellite 77305018 2 Speaker Stands it is a perfect fit, Because the ones they give you in the stand packaging dose not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ţɧḝ Ţḝḉɧἧở ᾧΐţḉḩ

customer_reviews.title: just died, after 4 years
customer_reviews.text: was happy with the sound quality. would have gave 4 stars due to the poor remote lcd design and the other minor issues like delay in starting of video etc. it just died after 4 years. power indication no longer can be lit and tried power cords and outlets, can't power on. and seems like this is not the only unit per the recent reviews here.
customer_reviews.author: mikecj2

customer_reviews.title: Box missing remote and cables
customer_reviews.text: As others have, when I received the item, it appeared as though the box had been previously opened and then poorly retaped up with packing tape. When I opened the box, the four speakers were there, but there was no remote or cables inside, making the sound bar useless. I called amazon to fix it, and the first customer service representative was less than helpful (rare for amazon), but the manager was more than helpful. I'll update my review once I get everything sorted out.
customer_reviews.author: Maritimer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Easy to install, terrific surround sound quality for the money. I can't believe we got this level of sound from a $300 system. It's not perfect - the mid range sound can be iffy under certain circumstances (esp. when connecting a phone with Bluetooth) and sometimes you have to monkey with the settings to get the balance right between the subwoofer and the sound bar. Also, as others have noted, the two surround speakers are not wireless, connecting to the subwoofer with unfortunately short cables that really limit your placement options. But those minor complaints aside, this is way more bang for the buck than I ever expected.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Stohler

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality product. I have had the soundbar for less than 4 years. The screen on the remote has stopped working and now the main soundbar itself has stopped working. It is quite obvious that I bought a faulty soundbar. Contacted Vizio and they instructed a factory reset which I cannot do without a functioning screen on the remote. This is a useless pile of junk and I will not be buying Vizio products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Can Finally Head What the Characters Are Saying!
customer_reviews.text: I can FINALLY hear what's coming out of my TV! Yay! This was pretty simple to set up. I have one of those TVs with the HDMI, RCA and Optical links on the back. I chose Optical, however. I've had zero issue with the lips syncing up with the sound, and the sound is a lot better than I was expecting for the price of this system. Just a heads up tho - if you get stands for the Satellite Speakers like I did - don't get the Atlantic Satellite 77305018 2 Speaker Stands (Black). The stands are sturdy, but these speakers are too small to be secured onto the stand using screws. Had to use double sided tape.
customer_reviews.author: V. Boliew

customer_reviews.title: Great low end system
customer_reviews.text: This such a fantastic low-end sound system. The soundbar goes under the TV, and the subwoofer goes anywhere else in the room. The satellite speakers are wired to the subwoofer. What does this mean - LESS WIRES. Because the soundbar (connected to the TV via Optical link) communicates with the subwoofer/satellites wirelessly. Add to that bluetooth, and now I can play music from my cell phone. An audiophile/videophile will no doubt find this system inadequate. But, for most of use this is all that we need.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Lame! I just wanted to make my new toy ...
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived without a remote control, power cables, or audio cables. I contacted Amazon customer support first and they offered me a $50 refund to replace those items myself. Lame! I just wanted to make my new toy work! So I contacted Vizio customer support and they sent me a box with the missing items right away. Now that everything is set up I can say installation was very easy, learning to use the surround sound was a piece of cake, and it sounds awesome. I've never had a surround sound system before and now I'll never be able to watch football at home without one again. Definitely a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: While the sound is far from first class - the price is excellent given the product features and ease of use. The sound is very good, clean and crisp typically with plenty of bass when wanted. Not to be confused with more expensive set-ups, this is a great way to enhance your flat screen TV sound and enjoy a nice audio experience for a decent price. Excellent enhancement for second and third televisions in bedrooms or non-primary living areas. I would still go with a more substantial system for the primary entertainment venue in the house, but this is a really great way to upgrade the secondary rooms audio experience!
customer_reviews.author: Tom CatCity

customer_reviews.title: Great soundbar!
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar and the wireless subwoofer (and attached by wire remote speakers) is a great sound system in your family room! Adds enough power and volume so you can hear your movies and other shows, plus the ability to change volume levels of different speakers is VERY NICE! This is a great product! Would buy it again without hesitation. Plenty of inputs instead of just one like most of today's soundbars. The blue tooth works great on our iPhones and other devices. A little hard to read the display for the programming of volume levels, etc. The display could be a little brighter (please and thank you Visio).
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been awesome! Best surround system I've ever owned by far. The only problem I've had is when first turning on the system, the default subwoofer volume is very high. When I turn it down one notch then back up one notch it drops down and sounds fine. My wife still gets scared and thinks someone is creeping around outside when she hears stuff on the surround speakers. The wireless sub and Bluetooth option were the reason I bought this and I don't regret it at all. Good job Vizio.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Vizio S4251w-B4 Soundbar System Review
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar system has the neat feature of not needing wires to connect the subwoofer to the sound bar itself. The subwoofer is connected by bluetooth to the sound bar. When the sound bar is turned off, the subwoofer apparently powers down to reduce energy consumption. However, when my subwoofer is on the floor and not in line of sight of the sound bar it will not restart the bluetooth connection after it powers down. I have had to relocate my subwoofer to a somewhat less than perfect spot as a result of this. Otherwise I would have rated it with 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: John Appleseed

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product, GREAT VALUE for what you pay for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product, GREAT VALUE for what you pay for it. The satellite speakers actually hook up with the bass, so they're not completely wireless. It also has a slight delay whenever you start viewing something new, maybe a second or two. It gives great sound quality, and the bass is INTENSE. There's ways to alter the sound by turning up the front speakers, lowering the rear speakers, pumping up the bass, etc. This also comes with a AUX wire to hook up with phones, ipods, etc. Great system!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Haffeman

customer_reviews.title: Really really happy
customer_reviews.text: Really glad a I bought these. Sounds great. optical cable comes with midrange speakers plug into subwoofer so no wires are extending from the sound bar The only thing I did wrong is got the 42" sound bar for my 42" monitor. Didn't realize the sound bar is 42" when my tv is measured diagonally so the sound bar extends a few inches from each side of my tv. The first one I received the sound bar was broken. I called Amazon and they sent a new one without a problem. I was treated very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Jensen

customer_reviews.title: You WONT be Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Totally over exceeded my expectations. I now have 3 Vizio TV's, and my latest is the M series 3d model, which also is great. Paired this system up with the big screen and you have superb sound without all the wires. Rear wireless sub and speakers are a great addition to the soundbar, which I was not always a fan of. I was the guy in college who had 5.1 surround systems when all of my friends were jamming out on their laptops... Needless to say, this thing has won awards and for good reason, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pezzula

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! No kidding full DTS surround sound, wireless sub and surround speakers, bluetooth connectivity and a price of $249 for the 44" version. What a deal! The sound is excellent but what surprised me was the audio conversion from 2ch to 5.1 for regular audio playback (I stream BT through my phone). The auto mix to 5.1 makes music sound fantastic. I'm currently re-listening to my favourite albums, I'm well impressed. Looks - It's clean and also no Sony/Vizio logos just plain and simple. I did a lot of research of soundbars/5.1 etc and the worry is how it will sound, which you won't know until you get it in your home. I can confirm this is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Steve-O

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is worlds better than anything your TV has now. I'm coming from experiencing my fathers $2,000, wired, full surround sound to this and honestly this is just as good if not better in my opinion. The setup was beyond easy, plug them in and you're done. The satellite speakers add an awesome affect with true or simulated surround sound, making anything you watch instantly better, and the subwoofer adds the perfect depth to any action seen. Also, not really what I bought the product for, but the bluetooth feature makes for a very good sound system for whenever you're entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product with best price available!
customer_reviews.text: Added to my wish list and one day the price tanked, so I just had to order it! Great, clear sounds and major bass. This looks, functions and sounds perfect. Just make sure you run it correctly, (all the hdmi's into the TV and then audio cable from TV to soundbar so that all sources have sound from soundbar). Edit: One year down the road, the left rear satelite speaker developed a crackle at certain tones. Called Vizio and was told that no replacement speakers are available and that I would have to buy an entire new system.. works great other than the distortion/crackle from the rear speaker.
customer_reviews.author: B. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my bedroom, which is a decent size. The subwoofer (connected to the soundbar through bluetooth) is under my bed, with the two smaller speakers hung up on my wall, about 4 feet off the ground. The soundbar itself is hooked up to my 4k TV and sits just right in front of it. I ended up using an optical cable to connect it. For the price, this sound system is amazing for both movies and games.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Northrup

customer_reviews.title: Price - cheap, sound - not so!
customer_reviews.text: If there's anything cheap about this product that's its price. I was hesitant to pay about 300 bucks just for a sound system. But now after a couple of months into using it I can say this product is the best thing I bought on Amazon so far. It has an amazingly deep bass and well balanced highs as well. I placed mine on the TV stand behind my LG 49UB8500. Because it connects wirelessly to the subwoofer my whole sound system goes pretty much unnoticeable, only until I turn on TV or music, at which point everybody starts wowing! It took a while for the seller to ship the product, but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: One big flaw
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sound bar - excellent sound, easy to use, great price. But it has one flaw that has proved to be a deal killer for me. The volume can only be adjusted in very large increments. In our daily use, we have found that we have two choices: "too loud" and "not loud enough". Why can't Vizio give us a fully adjustable volume control, like their televisions and every other sound bar out there?
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sound with out the mess
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: Simple wiring, easy setup, multiple inputs, great sound for small rooms Con: Remote "LCD" is tough to see in the dark, Rear speakers use RCA connectors. This system is a huge upgrade over any built in speakers and the two rear speakers give a good surround sound experience. This is a good update over the VHT510. The addition of multiple inputs makes it more functional for say a TV and Xbox. The sounds is also clearer then on the VHT510 were the lows and highs got muddy it is now crisper. Get this if you want surround sound with out the cable mess and added AV equipment.
customer_reviews.author: D. Federwitz

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret purchasing this system  -  Almost too easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!!!! I am no expert at surround sound in a home. But I really enjoy listening to TV with this system. Sound bar comes with a template to hand it on the wall. Going to do that as soon as I get the TV mounted. Will look great together on the wall. BTW, I wear hearing aids. With this system I can actually here almost all of what is being spoken. In the past I was always missing some of the words. I am sure there are better systems out there. But for what I need to enjoy HD movies this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ken K.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poor remote
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent design. The sound bar mounts below (or above, as we did) your television. It connects wirelessly to the subwoofer, and the rear speakers connect with wire (provided) to the subwoofer, not the soundbar. So you can place the subwoofer behind you and connect the rear speakers to it instead of trailing wires all over the room. I would give it five stars if it weren't for the issue below: The remote is an essential controller -- but the display is not illuminated in any way and is VERY hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: Boxplayer

customer_reviews.title: Too many headaches, poor music sound, returned.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up and sounded ok playing movies. Music was another thing. Lots of buzzing in the trebles. And then the remote started to act up, only working sporadically. And then there were the times there was simply no sound at all. I tried the reset a few times, but it never worked like it was supposed to (lights on the front were to flash 3 times to let you know it worked). Had to unplug and hook it all back up. I know it was inexpensive, so I wasn't expecting super sound, but I didn't know it was cheap. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: linna

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Did research and read reviews prior to purchase, thought was going to be a good product but it ended up being a great product. Sound bar standlone has incredible rich sound using opitical input. Subwoofer and satellite speakers sound great when turned on. Calibrating it to my liking took no time at all using the remote. Only negative is satellite speaker wires are to short for where I wanted them but that is not a Vizio issue rather a furniture placement issue. Purchased longer wires and have no complaints. Would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for the price. Clearly not the very best audio quality if you want to hear all the notes but is more than good enough for a mid-sized room. The remote and system has a few quirks which you can spot in other reviews. But despite these irritants I am giving it 5 stars for its quality relative to price. I really like the fact that the bass module connects via bluetooth to the sound bar. No ugly wires running from the sound bar to the rear-channel speakers. However the rear-channel speakers are wired. Strongly recommended !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It sounds just as good, if not better than the separate component system ...
customer_reviews.text: The full AV receiver's days are numbered. I had a $1500 component and speaker system and the receiver crapped out on me. Replacing the receiver would cost $400-$700. I saw this as a full system for under $300 and figured what the heck. It sounds just as good, if not better than the separate component system that it replaced and it is way more compact. No more speakers hanging from the ceiling and wires around the room and not more component system. Sounds just as good, way less electronic clutter in the room, and half the price of just the receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Geekworking

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality for movies, TV, and music
customer_reviews.text: Just great, especially with my Vizio TV. Works every time, sounds amazing (actually sounds like you're in a movie theater). Lots of customizeable options. It's kind of annoying that they don't offer stalks/stands for the rear speakers with the set. I guess they don't know what kind of setup you have though. I'd definitely recommend mounting the speakers on pole stands or in your wall, I tried getting by without them, but it's definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: J. HallahanTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Better than old ONKYO system
customer_reviews.text: I'm unsure why some of the reviews are so glowing. This has replaced a full Onkyon HTS and I am MUCH happier with this than I EVER was with my ONKYO! It sounds good, the problem with finding the "right" volume is spot on, but I have found that some patience will get you there-it is frustrating at times but FAR from a deal breaker for me. Bluetooth is easy setup and sounds great. I am glad I made this purchase and love the satellite speakers. The bass is sometimes too much but the remote is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: kms

customer_reviews.title: A step up from tv speakers
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar added high quality audio to our movies and shows. It was easy to mount except the optical cord was a little short to route through the wall and reach my TV. The audio is not high end but is far better than the tv speakers. The sub woofer adds a much needed punch. The cords included for the rear speakers were far too short for any type of install in our living room. I ended up cutting off the plugs and adding speaker wire between so i could route them through the walls to my ceiling mounted speakers. We don't even use our TV speakers anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this regularly for several years. Works perfectfly still. Large package shipped all the way to Saipan and arrived in perfect condition. Thank you. Accept that the digital display on the remote will crap out soon but you'll get over it and still love the purchase. I still recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: t in saipan

customer_reviews.title: The best sound bar for the money hands down.
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these sound bars. In my opinion I thin vizio sounds bars are the best bang for your buck. Excellent quality and sound. I like this model because it is all black. The new model is gray and black which I do not like. I think they have started producing this model again and just updated the remote. You can pay a lot more for a sound bar and it probably will not sound better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed! You should get one too!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small living room which is not ideally configured for surround sound. This soundbar with wireless sub fit the bill perfectly! Brings a whole new dimension with movies and NFL games! Bluetooth pairing with my phone was seamless. Sound is perfect. I have it mounted with a 65" VIZIO (yes, I should have went with the 51" soundbar but budget dictates...) and it looks and sound great! Remote is "okay" at best, but once you have it set, I just put it away. Volume control is managed by my DirectTV remote and works flawlessly. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Thor

customer_reviews.title: ... wife got me this for my birthday and I love it. For the price you pay you are ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife got me this for my birthday and I love it. For the price you pay you are getting a great little sound system. We wanted something to listen to music from Pandora and to use when watching movies, but wasn't so pricy and fit snugly into our little apartment. This one is perfect. Between the sound bar, the sub woofer and the two little wall mounts you have all you need for a high quality little surround sound system.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, sound and price!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great price! We have hooked this up in our basement and are currently using the optical cable from an XBOX One and are getting amazing sound. It took some tweaking to get the treable/bass and center channel settings the way we like them, but this setup gives a true theater sound. We're in the process of slowly building our home theater setup, so once we have the TV and theater seating the way we like, I will update the review with more info and photos.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Covington

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sound; Inadequate Instructions
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great; the instructions suck. I had to call tech support twice because there's no mention of an interface with a cable box or DVD player. The remote could be a bit more intuitive (you need the manual to figure out how it works) and it seems like the remote requires line of sight. This requires some thought as to placement. I'll get used to it, and so far, the satellite speakers and subwoofer have added a very nice sound to my 3 year old Vizio TV. It is particularly noticeable for sporting events-very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer james pointer

customer_reviews.title: excellent compromise
customer_reviews.text: coming from a yamaha aventage receiver, martin logan motion 262 speakers and an emotiva ultra 12 sub, I was very skeptical about sound bars. This unit seemed to get universally high praise from many review sites. I am very satisfied with the performance and sound. the sub delivers solid performance but I am most satisfied with the sound clarity and balance from the bar itself. coming from a nice mid range full 5.1 set up I would say if space and simplicity is a concern for you, but you still want true surround sound this is your unit. would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sommers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value sound bar that sounds great as a bonus!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my new TV, it didn't have the same room for speakers that my old projection set had. This makes up for the lack of space in LED TVs for decent amplifiers and sound resonance pathways. I love that it uses Bluetooth to connect to the rear speakers (no crawling in the attic to run rear speaker wires for THIS guy!) It sounds great, adds the right level of Dolby 5.1 sound to fill a room (we have a big den, and it fills our room with sound)
customer_reviews.author: Walter the Southern Gentleman

customer_reviews.title: This surround system is super easy to setup and the sound quality itself is ...
customer_reviews.text: For less than $200, I didn't expect to get much but man, was i wrong! This surround system is super easy to setup and the sound quality itself is astounding. The soundbar has exceptional clarity and the wireless subwoofer really hits the lows to get you immersed in your media. The only small complaints I have regarding this system is that the wireless connection quality sometimes fluctuates and secondly, you don't always hear every detail from the satellite speakers like you would on the soundbar. Other than that, this is a very solid purchase for the money; I would recommend this to anybody!
customer_reviews.author: Yuriana Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound system for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar and speaker set is great for the price. When listening to music or watching a movie the sub woofer and rear speakers are great. it really changes the movie experience. The bluetooth connectivity option is great. When I get home and make dinner i toss the speaker on and the sound quality over blue tooth is great. There are HDMI inputs, av and SPDIF. I connect the SPDIF dirrectly into the XBOX One and get really great sound.
customer_reviews.author: nikisano316

customer_reviews.title: Great System
customer_reviews.text: Hooked this up in my bedroom and am now wishing it was with my entertainment center. The system greatly out performs my receiver and much more expensive 5.1 speaker set. The low number of inputs and TVs inability to pass through 5.1 audio is forcing me to keep this off the main system. But if you don't need many inputs or your TV supports 5.1 audio pass through, this is a great, powerful system that is easy to set up and minimizes the use of wires. The rear satellite speakers do connect to the sub-woofer with wires (provided).
customer_reviews.author: John C S

customer_reviews.title: Alot of sound out of small package
customer_reviews.text: From hookup which was a snap using suplied optical cable to progaming was a breeze. From turn on till tweeked took all of about 30min. For full sound leave truvol and night off both supress output in differant ways, from there on Ive had several people come over and everyone has same reaction WOW. Now it doesnt keep up with my Pioneer Elite VSX-05 hooked to Boston acoutics. But this thing cost less than my sub. Makes bedroom a nice retreat. Or if you were in an apartment this thing rocks hard enough to make you real popular with your neibors
customer_reviews.author: JDKaylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Soundbar, Recommend Highly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sound bar quite some time ago, and have been using it every day since. When I first purchased it I wanted it mostly for movies, but once I learned how much better everything sounded off it, I use it for everything I watch on TV. Pros -Easy set up, very few cords -Sound quality is great -Bluetooth is great for playing music from phones Cons -Large rooms might need longer cords between rear speakers and sub woofer -Not all sound types are supported for surround (no AC3)
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Geldart

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I am very happy with this set
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I am very happy with this set. I have been looking for one for months and finally settled on these. Only problem I have is I have direct tv and have to turn the sound bar on also. Other than that I really love it. Sounds great and was very easy to set up. Would recommend and will be getting another set to put in the basement for the other tv.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Full-room Sound - Super Easy to Install and Use
customer_reviews.text: I can't really think of anything wrong with this sound bar, it sounds great with deep and rich bass and good voice clarity. The wireless speakers instantly connected when I plugged them in. Easily programmed with my DirecTV remote and turned off the auto-power saver. The only possible complaint is that there is a Goldielocks gap between "too quiet" and "almost just right" when listening - on a number scale it would be like when you need 2.54 instead of 2 or 3. Super minor annoyance that is likely specific to me.
customer_reviews.author: Homburg Pokes

customer_reviews.title: Great product and sound, just be careful of....
customer_reviews.text: Placement. I ended up putting it front of my Vizio 70" and it obstructs the view if you're watching from the floor (with kids... well, they like to sit on the floor). Sitting on the sofa you don't notice the sound bar. So ideally, I either have to place the bar above the TV or raise the TV up. Haven't done either yet. The wireless rear speakers work great. Wish the RCA cables that came with it were a bit longer or Vizio included at least 1 extension cable. With a wide living room my placement choices were limited by the cable size (of course, I could just buy a longer cable, but haven't done so yet.).
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good product / wrong remote.
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong remote based on what was pictured in the instructions and on the box. I would like to have the vendor provide the correct one. While the remote I did receive will adjust sound levels and input, it will not allow me to control the volume of the sub or the surround speakers. Sound bar does sound good and has plenty of volume for my application. I would like to have more control over the until with the correct remote.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: An excellent choice...
customer_reviews.text: Great and powerful sound. There may be better sound bars, but not at this price. I especially liked that it was able to learn some commans of my TV remote, so I do not need the included remote for basic controls.The sound depends a lot on the source, but in comparison with TV speakers it's a huge upgrade. I was lucky that my TV had an optical output that put through Dolby Digital and does not down sample otherwise I would have needed a HDMI to optical splitter to get the best sound....
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Peter Konig

customer_reviews.title: system was bought used but in very good condition. the re-saler sent the wrong power supply ...
customer_reviews.text: system was bought used but in very good condition. the re-saler sent the wrong power supply cable, but was very prompt in sending the correct one after a few emails. I did have to download the instructions for installation online - something that wasn't included in the instructions was also having to change the audio output on the settings on my TV!!! Make sure you check! Otherwise, a great product. I love the sound quality - so much better that the mono from the LG TV i have.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Has been a great system. Only problem is that the volume is ...
customer_reviews.text: Has been a great system. Only problem is that the volume is weird. You can't turn it up more than a few clicks without it being super loud. The base volume on one click is way too loud for the lowest setting. If you use something like an iPhone, you need to turn down the volume on the iPhone, then turn up the volume on the speaker or you get distortion. It's weird.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound System
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item to match my tv and it arrived with no problem. After about 70 days a speaker in the bar went out. It was out of amazon warranty but they had vizio contact me. Vizio replaced the sound bar and the issue has yet to return. It has been about 2 years of almost daily use
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY better than all the other expensive ones. But remember, the sound is totally dependent on the sender NOT the reciever.
customer_reviews.text: WOW, LOVE IT!. However some TV shows use a "SUB POUNDING SOUND" like a heart beat to enhance scarry situations and this can be anoying. However it is adjustable and you can program the Bass down and increase theTreble. Also you can reset it to its orifional setting. The led reader is a bit small and hare to see in dim light, so keep a flash light near by.Various TV stations use a variety od sendin sound signals, so don't blame this device. Blame the sender.
customer_reviews.author: Milo N. Illich

customer_reviews.title: This sound bar works great. However the instructions as to how to install ...
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar works great. However the instructions as to how to install it, at least for a novice, leaves a lot to be desired. I ended up calling VIZIO and the customer service group walked me through the set up. Installing the wiring is no big thing. However, making the Bar work with the TV is a little more difficult based on the instructions that came with the unit. VIZIO's customer service is good and they speak English. Five stars if the instructions were any good.
customer_reviews.author: Trapshooter

customer_reviews.title: CNET rated this older model higher than the newer SB4051-CO
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to have checked CNET ratings. Excellent value. Many kudos from guests over the Holidays. Take time to balance volume between front/woofer/rear speakers. Also find the ideal volume setting on the soundbar: it affects balance between speakers (weird) and sensitivity of +/- button on RC. Be aware not all TV programs are recorded in "surround" mode, in which case the rear speakers may not be active. That's not a defect.
customer_reviews.author: Isee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, great sound quality, needs a big tv though.
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love. I haven't mounted everything yet, but I'm in love with this system. The price and quality and aesthetic are all right on point, and the set up was easy, and when i couldnt figure something out, the instructions were short and to the point. The 32 inch TV i got to go with this is too small though. I'd recommend something in the high 40s or low 50s at least so it doesnt look silly next to the impressive sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Jay417

customer_reviews.title: These have been great! I love the Bluetooth connectivity
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets. One for my bedroom and one for the projector in the family room. These have been great! I love the Bluetooth connectivity. The optical in is what I use for most of the entertainment devices, but when a friend wants to play having the 3.5mm jack allows them to connect as well. This has everything you need to connect from whatever device you have. the sub-woofer provides a good kick and the surround sound works without any flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: This soundbar with wireless speakers was the best purchase I have ever made on-line
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have a sound bar but have speakers at the back of the room as well. This soundbar with wireless speakers was the best purchase I have ever made on-line. It creates excellent surround sound. It was easy to install, and it functions well with the TV. It comes on when the TV is turned on. Looks great, and the price was very reasonable. As usual, ordering and delivery was a breeze. If I could given it 10 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: anthony a. kordus

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectation but the center speaker can block screen
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound and easy to install. Much better than the simple YAS Yamaha sound bar my daughter has. Worth the extra 100 bucks or so. True 5.1 that is comparable to my expensive 5.1 Onkyo receiver and system in the family room. This one is in my bedroom. Easy to install. I bought the Atlantic speaker poles but it would have been ok to place the satellite speakers on our night stands. Decided to mount TV since my LG TV was not high enough and the center speaker is pretty high.
customer_reviews.author: attackdog

customer_reviews.title: No HDMI in? Come on VISIO!
customer_reviews.text: What a sound! This thing will fill your room, and then some. The one drawback that everyone has is that there is no HDMI in for this bar, which is a big drawback for me personally. But VISIO doesn't give you an option because the 55" one is so big, most households couldn't place that sound bar on their entertainment system! So you are stuck between a rock and a hard spot. I was able to set this thing up one armed, as my right arm is broken. If you have issues setting this up you are beyond hope.
customer_reviews.author: Degan

customer_reviews.title: This Sound Bar sounds great, its got deep bass and the sound quality ...
customer_reviews.text: This Sound Bar sounds great, its got deep bass and the sound quality is pretty good, much better and clearer than the stock speakers on my 55" Samsung LED 3D TV The rear speakers are great because they are cordless so you can just plug them in anywhere behind you with the subwoofer and you have a 5.1 sound system setup in your home in minutes. The bluetooth function is great for parties also.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Tsang

customer_reviews.title: I'm discovering that the two satellite speakers are not working!
customer_reviews.text: The product overall was OK. Great design and sound as expected, but I didn't open the package right away, so I'm discovering that the two satellite speakers are not working and I lost my return oportunity with Amazon. I have tried every step on the manual and applying some logic/experience to make them work without opening them but I have not been successful on it. Maybe I can obtain some helpful advice from anybody here? Thanks in advance!
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! I had a Denon that was actually too strong for the speakers that came with it and kept overheating and shutting down, not to mention a ton of wires. This Vizio is 5.1 and no clutter, plus it sounds great! Took 5 minutes to set up, easy to use and rocks the walls if you want it to. Using the bluetooth is simple, able to play mine and Amazon's music library through my iphone in a snap. Extremely happy with this system.
customer_reviews.author: J. Benvignati

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set up for about two years now and I still love it. However, now whenever I turn the sound bar on regardless of the previous setting the subwoofer is always turned up to the max setting. It's a little annoying to have bass blasting out your eardrums every time that you turn it on, but a quick dial with the remote solves the issue. That's the only reason I'm issuing it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Astounding Sound - Great Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I've had this system for around three weeks now and the sound is beyond impressive, its powerful. I love the bluetooth feature as I can connect my ipad or iphone and use it for my music also. The only downside is that the lcd on the remote is not backlit which makes it hard to see most of the time even during the day but unless you plan on changing the input a lot this is not a big deal. If your looking and comparing you can stop now, just buy it. All of my movies, television shows, and music come to life with this system.
customer_reviews.author: Trent J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! Item order placed on Dec. 10th and delivered on the 14th. Product arrived undamaged. Setup was simple, connected the Soundbar to the TV with an (included) optical cable and power cable. Sub woofer and Satellite speakers are connected by two separate (color coded) wires instead of regular speaker wire. Wall mounting brackets are included for both the speakers and the soundbar. Going through the EQ settings on the soundbar itself didn't take very long, watched a Netflix movie in 5.1 and enjoyed. Excellent product, would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to get a simple useable system for our 55" TV. I have gone through 2 other sets that never worked that well, and ended up trying this set out. It was pretty easy to set up the soundbar. It does have a wireless subwoofer and satellite speakers as stated, but those things are wired together. I wanted a completely wireless set, as I have two cats that like to chew wires. I had to do some wall mounting, but they work well.
customer_reviews.author: KWarner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome inexpensive soundbar.
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to set up, works better than expected. A great choice for our smallish apartment bedroom. I bought it for enhancing the flat screen sound but the bluetooth works well, too so I can use it to stream music with my phone, making ironing so much less unpleasant (for everyone but my neighbors- beware that the subwoofer woofs from woofy to ultra woofy) Found instructions online to program the Comcast remote to adjust the volume and sub as well as power on/off, very easy to do. Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Keller

customer_reviews.title: Get Extended Warranty!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The device great surround sound and the Bluetooth wireless was good. Purchased mine in May of 2014 and the sound bar will no longer power up. Plus, trying to find someone to repair is near impossible!
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Sound is fantastic - terrific value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sound is fantastic - terrific value for the price. Easy to install and looks very clean in our living room. We will be enjoying this for a long time (I hope!). Perhaps I am not very tech savvy (actually, I know I am not very tech savvy) but when this item said "wireless" its referring to the sound bar itself... the speakers and the subwoofer still need to be plugged in and the cords aren't extremely long - just wanted to mention in case this is helpful to someone else who potentially could misinterpret this :).
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: It's warming up nicely. Loud!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds pretty good so far. Not as good at the 5.1 system it is replacing, but a lot easier to wire and it's got the clean look we want. One thing, my TV is not doing a good job of passing surround out through the optical port, which I guess is a known issue that CNET has done some work on. Next purchase for me is an HDMI switch that has separate audio out, so I can make sure the system is running surround (since that was a buying point for me).
customer_reviews.author: Scott O.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound, Very easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these so I wouldn't have wires running across the room. these work perfectly for that and it is very easy to setup. Very user friendly. I ended up adjusting it slightly so the back speakers would put out a little more sound because they were pretty quiet, but it's set perfectly now. the remote is simple and it's very easy to adjust the speakers and volume. Highly recommend if you don't want wires running across your living room area.
customer_reviews.author: Justin schnirch

customer_reviews.title: Epic Sound Without Being A Sound Geek
customer_reviews.text: ** This review was for a Vizio sound bar I purchased in 2015. It's currently tied to a completely different product. Buyer beware. ** My old 5-star review for the Vizio sound bar below: + Easy Setup + Amazingly Clear Sound + LOUD (I've yet to turn it all the way up in our 1k sqft living room) + Remote Control Integration (easily added to a comcast remote) - Doesn't do my laundry
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan Cajun

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Value!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this soundbar for over a year now. Still works and sounds great. When I think of some of the best sound and quality, I don't usually think of Vizio, but this product is awesome and reliable. We use it daily. Hooked to the TV through an optical cable, it plays whatever is on the TV with no issues, regardless of what input you use to feed video to the TV. The bass is great and the voices are clear.. which was our main complaint with just the TV sound. 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke2040

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought and set up yesterday! The setup was very easy, and they even included every type of cable you could possibly need! I had actually ordered an optical audio cable separately, not expecting one to be included, but it was! The various settings are highly-customizable, but the default levels are just perfect. The sound is incredible and the surround sound DRASTICALLY improved my experience! Definitely a worthwhile investment!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cowan

customer_reviews.title: and it sounds amazing. The living room is kinda small in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Gift to my dad for Christmas. We opened it during Thanksgiving, set it up, and it sounds amazing. The living room is kinda small in the town house where they live, and the sound is rich and delightful. I like that you can vary the intensity/volume on treble and bass on the various speakers and even the sub. I can't wait until we watch a thriller on these during Christmas. It's going to sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Bassmonster!
customer_reviews.text: What a ROBUST sound this little system has! It is perfectly low or loud when you need it to be. The subwoofer is quite powerful. There is a reason that this sound system is rated so highly! It is amazing for the price. The remote can put the system into a setting called "Night Mode" where it turns down the subwoofer so it doesn't bother people trying to sleep. Some shows and movies still make it sound like Night Mode is turned off. That subwoofer will shake your house. The satelite speakers are very nice. They definately pick up all the ambient noises you don't really notice without a good sound system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, especially considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, especially considering the price. No problem with sub-woofer remaining paired with base but I do have it placed within 5 feet. Used with a Vizio TV so the volume on the TV remote also works the sound bar volume. One negative is the sound bar remote display is extremely difficult to see. It has no backlight making it impossible to see in a darkened room. This can be very annoying and is the only reason for knocking off 1 star. Only had it a month so I can't comment on its longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

product_meta.title: VIZIO S4251W-B4B 5.1-Inch Soundbar with Wireless Subwoofer and Satellite Speakers
product_meta.description: Style:NewModernize your living room, patio, or bedroom with this Alphasonik wireless Bluetooth speaker Decor table with built-in wireless Qi charging station which features a contemporary design and durable construction. With a wireless Qi charger built in to the tabletop surface, you can charge your phone battery by simply placing it on the table - no cords needed! The Alphasonik Decor Bluetooth speaker charging table has multiple finish options that blend well with any color decoration. The table comes equipped with 2 USB ports, an AUX input, and a DC 16V power cord to charge the table itself so it can be moved to any location with no worries of having to plug it in like most charging devices. The Alphasonik Decor is ideal for indoor or outdoor, formal or informal settings. Enjoy the luxury of charging your phone wirelessly as well as 2 additional devices with a cord all while enjoying the meticulous design of the Bluetooth speaker embedded in the table! One port is a standard 5V 1A while the other is a fast charging enabled 5V 2.1A port. And for non-Bluetooth devices, this smart table has a 3.5mm AUX port which can play songs from any device. Other than wireless charging and Bluetooth, this table also comes with other features such as Auto Shut Off and Bluetooth wireless calling! The Decor is very easy to put together since all you have to do is screw on the 3 legs. The simple and elegant design offers unbelievable sound with 10 built in large audio drivers that offer full high definition stereo sound and provides enhanced bass! The 6,600mAh Li-ion batteries along with leading power technology combine to provide you with 24 hours of non-stop music! This one of a kind, sleek, elegant, yet technologically advanced piece of furniture will become your favorite without a doubt. Here at Alphasonik we strive to be a step ahead and this is our personal invitation for you to have the next best product in your household.
feature_bullets: SLEEK ELEGANT & FUNCTIONAL - Alphasonik Introduces the modern accent table. Standing 25 inches tall, this contemporary accent piece compliments any modern setting perfectly. Featuring sleek piano black finish wrapped in black fabric. This table features a powerful built-in Bluetooth speaker and wireless Qi charging for enabled smart devices. The table itself has a large rechargeable battery so you can move it around for wireless use

360° BLUETOOTH SPEAKER - 10 state of the art drivers! 4 speakers, 2 tweeters and 4 passive radiators (bass) are wrapped behind the fabric producing crystal clear audio. This table produces a 360° full stereo effect producing massive audio to fill any sized room

Qi WIRELESS CHARGING - The future is wireless. A built in wireless charger allows you to simply set your smart device on top of the Qi symbol on the center of the tabletop and it will begin charging your smart device. Compatible with all wirelessly enabled devices like iPhone, Samsung and more. Please note that Wireless charging only works when your phone is not covered with a protective case

ALL THE PORTS - Two USB ports and AUX port are conveniently placed on the back side without sacrificing design. You can use the ports to power devices that require a cable or play music from any device using the included AUX cable
QUICK & EASY INSTALLATION - Only 3 piece set up required and you're ready to enjoy within minutes
